EmailTemplate.description: Email - #5c – Sent e-Sign (1 day after e-Sign is sent)
EmailTemplate.name: Email - #5c – Sent e-Sign (1 day after e-Sign is sent)
EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, re: Saddle Rock Legal Group / IMPORTANT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Since we haven't heard from you, can we assume you have questions about the e-Sign agreement we emailed you?
If you do have questions, we are ready to discuss any concerns with you.
Thanks, Saddle Rock Legal Group {!Organization.Phone}
